title: Funny Face Horse
subtitle: Digital Piece
alt: bay pinto horse sticking its face out it's wooden stall window flaring it's nostrils, yawning, and sticking it's tongue out
description:
2021 

I really enjoyed making this goofy guy. I was experimenting with using line work as well as shading with this piece and while I learned a lot, it's not a technique I really enjoyed, so I'll be using it different if I use it in the future.
